description: Turn to these penny loafers from Giorgio Armani for a timeless addition to your everyday wardrobe. The style is crafted from black leather and set atop a thick rubber sole for comfort.
Giorgio Armani elevates these Derby shoes with a distinct platform rubber sole. Made in Italy from black leather, the lace-up style has a rounded toe and logo lettering on the tongue.
With an almond-shaped toe, these classic Oxford shoes from Zegna are Italian-crafted from supple leather. The design features a formal lace-up detail and is finished with sleek rubber soles.

Versatile and practical, these Chelsea boots from Bottega Veneta are a modern wardrobe staple. Made from black brushed leather, the round-toe style has elasticated inserts and is set atop a rubber-injected outsole.

Arriving in a classic silhouette, these loafers from Dolce&Gabbana will make a refined addition to your edit. Expertly crafted from plush suede, the style rests on quilted footbeds and is adorned with gleaming golden hardware.

Designed to transcend seasons and trends, Lemaire's styles strike the perfect balance between quality and functionality. These Derby shoes are crafted from polished black leather and rest on stacked heels.
Add refined designs to your footwear rotation, cue these Chelsea boots from Tod's. Crafted from suede, the brown style features elasticated sides and brand-signature pebble detailing at the heels.

A true classic, these loafers from Gucci feature the label's iconic golden Horsebit detail over the bridges. The slip-on pair is made in Italy from supple leather and features tonal stitching throughout.

The Happyrui low-top sneakers from Christian Louboutin are inspired by classic tennis shoes. Set atop thick rubber soles, they're crafted from a mix of off-white leather, suede, and nylon, and are finished with a heel tab.

This update to Maison Margiela's iconic Replica sneakers sees the sleek silhouette in a white and grey shade with leather uppers, suede trims and debossed logo on the tongue, atop a brown rubber sole.

Christian Louboutin’s Happyrui sneakers are a low-top design inspired by classic tennis shoes.  The modern style combines leather and suede panels with tactile monogrammed fabric and sits atop thick rubber soles.
Classic and sophisticated, these moccasins from Gucci are crafted from brown leather and GG Supreme canvas. The style features Interlocking G cut-out detail and a pebbled rubber sole.
Made from suede, these brown loafers from Tod's have a slip-on design, detailed with ties at the front and the label's signature rubber pebbles on the heel and soles.

A historic interpretation of founder Guccio Gucci's initials, GG Supreme canvas is a key fabric at the house of Gucci. These sneakers are inspired by tennis, featuring lugged rubber soles with logo midsoles.

The Gommino driving shoes from Tods will make a timeless addition to your footwear edit. Made from suede, this dark brown style has a slip-on design detailed with the label's signature rubber pebbles on the heel and soles.

Acne Studios experiments with the classics, inspiring a new generation of Scandi design. These calfskin loafers are detailed with "A" and "S" gold foil letters on the round toes and finished with gathered apron seaming.
These black suede ankle boots from Saint Laurent offer ultimate style and comfort in a slim silhouette, and feature elastic side panels and leather soles.
The Gucci Run sneakers are a streamlined version of traditional running styles. Made from plush suede with mesh inserts and GG embroidery, the design is set on bi-chromatic soles.

Crafted from smooth nappa leather, the Toy slippers are a sophisticated choice with seamless construction and a squared-toe silhouette. All of Loewe's leather goods are handcrafted in Spain, reflecting the house's centuries-long expertise and artisanal methods.

Loewe's Ease thong sandals are the ultimate comfy warm-weather footwear. Made from tan-orange leather and set atop a rubber sole, the style has a molded footbed and is finished with an Anagram buckle.

Valentino Garavani's polished approach to formalwear is spotlighted by these Oxford shoes. Made of polished calfskin, this round-toe design features lace-up vamps and thick leather soles, ensuring both style and durability.

Each Brunello Cucinelli design is handmade in Solomeo, a medieval hamlet whose art and traditions are woven into the house's every fiber. These Chelsea boots are crafted from refined suede with rubber soles and elasticated sides.

Acne Studios brings an unexpected touch to these Derby shoes with a subtle bump finish detailing at the rounded toe. The lace-up style is crafted from glossy black leather and pairs easily with any outfit.
Slip into the relaxed sophistication of Tom Ford with these black and khaki green slides. The wide camouflage suede vamps are perforated with "TF" motifs and rest on molded rubber soles.

Christian Louboutin's Louis Junior Spikes sneakers are Italian-made with blue suede uppers and feature spiked embellishments on the rounded toe. The lace-up style has a low-top silhouette and is set atop a rubber sole.
Christian Louboutin's Paqueboat loafers are inspired by the boat shoe silhouette. Made from beige canvas and leather, this style has a rounded toe and is set atop a comfy rubber sole.

These Chelsea boots from Dolce&Gabbana are equal parts chic and sturdy. Made from brushed black leather, the style features elasticated inserts, a heel tab, and a chunky rubber sole for ultimate comfort.
With a distinctive silver-tone chained plaque on the uppers, these JW Anderson mules are made from beige shearling-trimmed suede with cork midsoles for a comfortable and lightweight step.

Christian Louboutin's Fun Louis Junior low-top sneakers are a chic addition to your off-duty rotation. Made from white leather with red grosgrain piping, the lace-up style has logo lettering at the heel and a rubber sole.
With a distinctive silver-tone chained plaque on the uppers, these JW Anderson mules are made from black shearling-trimmed suede with cork midsoles for a comfortable and lightweight step.
Made in Italy with hand-stitched details, these driving shoes from Tod's are made from suede with a leather lining, and feature signature rubber pebbles at the sole and heel.
Slip into these loafers from Gucci for an instantly sophisticated finish to your look. The style is made in Italy from off-white leather, and is accented with gold-tone Interlocking G hardware.

Calling to mind the chunky styles of an earlier era, Amiri's MA-1 sneakers have wide laces and oversized tongues. Made from panels of leather, they feature mesh inserts and perforated toe boxes for optimal airflow.

product_name: GG Supreme canvas and leather sneakers
description: A historic interpretation of founder Guccio Gucci's initials, GG Supreme canvas is a key fabric at the house of Gucci. Made in Italy from the iconic material, these sneakers come with logo lettering on the backs of the rubber soles.

Inspired by Los Angeles streetwear culture, Amiri presents a rock’n’roll aesthetic with a luxurious slant. The Chunky Skel sneakers are made from leather to a low-top silhouette, featuring hand-cut bone appliqués on the sides.

Every Loro Piana design combines the best of Italian craftsmanship with the finest raw materials. The beige Seaside Walk espadrilles have apron toes, topstitched panel seaming, and rest on jute-wrapped soles.

These loafers from Gucci are easy to wear and endlessly versatile. Made from black leather, the style is accented with the house's signature red and green Web stripe, and gold-tone Horsebit hardware at the penny strap.

Calling to mind the chunky styles of an earlier era, Amiri's MA-1 sneakers have wide laces and oversized tongues. Made from panels of leather, they feature mesh inserts and perforated toe boxes for optimal airflow.
Balenciaga's Runner sneakers are made from panels of mesh and technical nylon. Featuring squared toes, they have logo embroidery on the tongues.

A favorite among modern dandies, the Mario loafers from Manolo Blahnik draw inspiration from the Regency fashion arbiter Beau Brummell. The streamlined shape is crafted in Italy with velvet uppers to suit evening and office attire alike.

A favorite among modern dandies, the Mario loafers from Manolo Blahnik draw inspiration from the Regency fashion arbiter Beau Brummell. The streamlined shape is crafted in Italy from patent leather to suit evening and office attire alike.

Achieve effortless elegance in the Otawi slides from Manolo Blahnik. Designed with cross-over straps, this pair is made in Italy from smooth black leather and has a cushioned leather insole for added comfort.

Manolo Blahnik's Monaco loafers are essential for between-the-seasons wear. Expertly crafted by artisans in Italy, the suede uppers have apron toes and the rubber soles are suitable for indoor or outdoor use.

Creativity and craftsmanship are at the heart of every Manolo Blahnik design, including the Plymouth penny loafers. Crafted in Italy from suede, this timeless essential has leather heel counters that allow the shoes to be worn backless.

Inspired by summer escapes to Capri, the Padstow loafers from Manolo Blahnik are a classic shape reimagined with a warm-weather appeal. The uppers are crafted from raffia with leather penny straps and heel counters.

Manolo Blahnik's Monaco loafers are essential for between-the-seasons wear. Expertly crafted by artisans in Italy, the suede uppers have apron toes and the rubber soles are suitable for indoor or outdoor use.

The MA Court high-top sneakers from Amiri will bring a sporty retro flair into your shoe collection. They're built with canvas uppers and thick rubber soles, then accented with logo detailing on the sides.

Lay the foundation for sharp dressing in a pair of Perry penny loafers from Manolo Blahnik. Handcrafted in Italy, this style is made from black top-grain leather and is well-suited for business or casual wear.
Invest in timeless footwear designs like the Truro loafers from Manolo Blahnik. Crafted in Italy from top-grain leather, this pair is elegantly shaped with apron toes and low heels.

Unparalleled artisanship shines through in John Lobb's designs, which are created using high-quality materials and meticulous manufacturing processes. Made in the United Kingdom, the Dixter Chelsea boots are made from luxurious brown suede.

Rick Owen’s Vintage Sneaks sneakers are a unique addition to your footwear collection. Crafted from calf hair with smooth leather panels, this design is set atop dented rubber soles and has a distinctive silhouette.

A signature style of Rick Owens, these Geobasket calf hair sneakers feature a distinctive high-top silhouette. The pair is structured with contrasting white panels and is finished with comfortable shark-tooth rubber soles.

Since its conception in 1961, Saint Laurent has been coveted for its elegant Parisian aesthetic. The Vlad ankle boots embody this distinct flair with a streamlined silhouette, crafted from smooth leather and detailed with buckled front straps.

Creativity and craftsmanship are at the heart of every Manolo Blahnik design, including the Plymouth penny loafers. Crafted in Italy from suede, this timeless essential has leather heel counters that allow the shoes to be worn backless.

Designed to transcend seasons and trends, Lemaire's styles strike the perfect balance between quality and functionality. Characterized by a two-panel stitched construction, the Piped brown calfskin slippers are grained with crêpe rubber soles.

Adapting Maison Margiela's iconic Tabi silhouette for formal wear, these sleek Derby shoes are made in Italy from smooth black leather, rest on stack leather heels, and feature the brand's signature split-toe design.

Designed to transcend seasons and trends, Lemaire's styles strike the perfect balance between quality and functionality. Inspired by the Piped slippers, these gray leather ankle boots have a two-panel stitched construction and crêpe soles.

All of Loewe's leather goods are handcrafted in Spain, reflecting the house's centuries-long expertise and artisanal methods. Made of polished black calfskin, the Terra Derby shoes have a classic construction with characterful upturned-toe boxes.

From casualwear to tailoring, JW Anderson marries modernity with style in every design. Appearing in a black and white felted checked pattern, these slip-on mules have calfskin trims and loafer-inspired penny straps.
These Vintage sneakers from DRKSHDW by Rick Owens showcase a  modern two-tone colorway on sturdy denim uppers. Intricate contrast stitching and ridged rubber soles complete the street-ready style.

In a classic Chelsea silhouette, these dark brown boots from John Lobb are expertly crafted in the United Kingdom, featuring elasticated panels on each side; the style is accented with polished buckles.
Made from suede and technical nylon, the Flow Runner low-top sneakers from Loewe feature a soft upper with L insignia. This style has rubber soles that curve around the toe and back of the heel.

Turn to Christian Louboutin's Dhabubizz sandals for an elegant and effortlessly everyday option. Set atop a rubber sole, the style features an H-shaped leather upper and is finished with a silver-tone 'CL' monogram.
In a clean white hue, these sneakers from Kiton are distinguished by their minimal stitch detailing. Made from leather, the low-top design is finished with suede heel counters.
The Gucci Run sneakers are a streamlined version of traditional running styles. Made from plush suede with mesh inserts and GG embroidery, the design is set on bi-chromatic soles.

Brunello Cucinelli's designs are created in Solomeo, a medieval hamlet whose art and traditions are woven into the house's every fiber. These classic ankle boots are made from light brown suede and set atop a rubber sole.

Unparalleled artisanship shines through in John Lobb's designs, which are created using high-quality materials and meticulous manufacturing processes. A classic silhouette, the Mason Chelsea boots are crafted from smooth leather with stacked heels, elasticated side gussets, pull tabs, and buckle details.
Made from suede and Orignal GG canvas, these sneakers pay homage to classic sportswear. The style rest atop chunky rubber soles and are finished with an oval enameled Double G detail at the front.

A tactile iteration of Gucci's classic Jordaan loafers, this pair is made in Italy from lustrous velvet in black, features the GG logo all-over, and is finished with the label's signature Horsebit motif on the uppers on gold-tone.

These mules from Versace represent label-signature easy elegance. Expertly crafted from leather, the style sits atop ridged rubber soles and boasts all-over logo lettering with penny slots and golden Medusa accents.

Designed to transcend seasons and trends, Lemaire's styles strike the perfect balance between quality and functionality. These slippers are expertly crafted from polished leather and boast a minimalist round-toe silhouette.
The Show ankle boots from Givenchy are a must-have pair. They’re made in Italy from shiny leather with a lace-up fastening.
These ankle boots from Gucci are made from smooth leather in a sophisticated silhouette with side-zip closure. The style is defined by a gold-tone horsebit detail for a subtle label-signature nod.

Christian Louboutin's Chambeliss Derby shoes are the perfect finishing touch to any look. Slick and refined, the slender style is crafted from leather and arrives with a removable silver-tone piercing embellishment.

product_name: SL/80 high-top leather and suede sneakers
description: For a stealthy yet clean option for everyday wear, look to the SL/80 sneakers from Saint Laurent. The high-top design is dressed in a white and gray color scheme, and comes constructed in leather with contrast suede trims, while featuring a logo design on the heel counters.

Calling to mind the chunky styles of an earlier era, the MA-1 sneakers from Amiri have wide laces and oversized tongues. They’re made from panels of leather with mesh inserts and perforated uppers to ensure airflow.

Elevate your everyday edit with Dolce&Gabbana's effortlessly elegant Saint Tropez sneakers. Set atop rubber soles, the understated style is crafted from white leather and is finished with flat laces and a gold-tone logo tag.

Since its conception in 1961, Saint Laurent has been coveted for its elegant Parisian aesthetic. This simple sophistication is exemplified by these sandals, made here in smooth leather. The design is enhanced by gold-tone Cassandre logo plaques and decorative studs along the soles.

Thom Browne has gained global attention for redefining contemporary tailoring and creating a modern uniform. Made of glossy calfskin, these Oxford shoes have signature grosgrain trim pull tabs, round toes, and block heels.
A signature Christian Louboutin style, the Lou Spikes sneakers are both casual and edgy. They're built with suede uppers, rubber soles, and iconic embellishments at the toe caps.
The Clay low-top sneakers from Lanvin are made from white leather uppers, accented by beige suede details, and are finished with the label's logo on the tongue and sides.

The Louis Junior sneakers are Christian Louboutin's take on classic basketball styles. Made from various tones of suede, this low-top design boasts streamlined panels, a heel tab, and iconic red soles.
Crafted in Italy, these classic brown Gucci loafers have elongated toes and slightly lifted heels, and are embellished with gold horsebit details.

Elevate your looks with ease by slipping into these Gucci loafers. Crafted in Italy from polished grained leather, these are a timeless investment with half-horsebit detailing and rest atop comfortable pebbled soles.
Turn to Bottega Veneta for styles that are both contemporary and impeccably crafted – such as these sandals. The pair is made from supple leather with wide, crossover straps, and molded footbeds.

These elegant Oxford shoes from Christian Louboutin are crafted from black leather, suede, and textured fabric. The style features tonal grosgrain ribbon trim, an elongated toe, and is finished with the label's signature red-lacquered soles.
Made in Italy with hand-stitched details, these beige driving shoes from Tod's are made from suede with a leather lining, and signature rubber pebbles for maximum flexibility.
These slides from Burberry are defined by its cotton canvas upper featuring a checked pattern and cutout detailing. The style has a contoured rubber insole for ultimate comfort.
These slippers from Gucci are presented in GG Supreme canvas with tonal leather trims. Inspired by the house’s equestrian heritage, the gold-toned Horsebit creates a sophisticated finish.

Crafted with soft suede trims, the Flow Runner sneakers from Loewe are made in a round-toe lace-up silhouette. They feature the brand's Anagram logo on the sides, slightly padded ankles, and gum rubber soles.

The Anagram logo was designed by the Spanish artist Vicente Vela as a quadruple-L insignia that now lends instant recognition to any Loewe piece. The motif punctuates the spherical toe post on these black sandals.

Developed in the 1970s, Bottega Veneta's artful intrecciato technique guarantees the longevity of its leather goods. These leather slippers are crafted in Italy using the brand’s signature technique and rest atop comfortable cushioned soles.

Boasting denim uppers, these mules have grooved rubber soles that wrap the round toes. This piece is part of a continuing collaboration that combines Loewe's artisan legacy with the carefree spirit of Paula's Ibiza.

Turn to these sandals from Christian Louboutin for an elegant addition to your summer wardrobe. Made from brown leather, the style has is topped off with a silver-tone monogram and has a comfortable padded sole.

The effortlessly elegant Sifnos sandals are made from crossed straps of black and brown leather. This piece features the extremely elegant Scritto motif, created by Olga Berluti as an homage to the art of calligraphy.
Made from leather, these black loafers from Tod's have a slip-on design detailed with the label's signature rubber pebbles on the heel and soles.

The Paquepapa No Back from Christian Louboutin expertly blends two footwear classics: espadrilles and penny loafers. Crafted from suede with croc-effect leather heels that fold down, this style has refined uppers and jute soles.
Maison Margiela brings its signature Tabi split toe to a pair of classic low-top sneakers. Made from white canvas, the design has contrast topstitching and the brand's numerical logo on the tongues.
Maison Margiela brings its signature Tabi split toe to a pair of classic low-top sneakers. Made from black canvas, the design has contrast topstitching and the brand's numerical logo on the tongues.

Tod's embodies the art of Italian craftsmanship with superior fabrications and timeless silhouettes that lend a sense of quiet sophistication. Crafted from leather, these ankle boots feature elasticated ankle side straps and sit stop signature pebbled rubber soles.
Elegant and timeless, these loafers from Christian Louboutin are crafted in Italy from plush black velvet. The style features a slender silhouette and is finished with tonal grosgrain piping.

Aptly nicknamed The Lord of Darkness, Rick Owens brings gothic and industrial inspiration to avant-garde design. Crafted from smooth black leather, the Bozo Tractor ankle boots sit atop chunky rubber soles and feature snap-button fastenings.

Look to Tod’s for timeless and sophisticated silhouettes such as the W.G. ankle boots. Crafted from suede, this design has lace-up fronts and sits atop chunky rubber soles, featuring the signature nubs on the heel counters.

Step into the sophisticated vision of Tom Ford with the Cambridge low-top sneakers, appearing in blue velvet with cream rubber soles. This style has tonal leather panels, Lozenge logo heel counters, and tonal eyelets.

Tod's embodies the art of Italian craftsmanship with superior fabrications and timeless silhouettes that lend a sense of quiet sophistication. Made of beige calfskin suede, these low-top sneakers have embossed logo sidewalls and nub-detailed heels.
These loafers from Tod are a slip-on style for easy on-the-go wear. They’re made in Italy from blue-toned suede atop versatile rubber lug soles.

Add Vassili 60 ankle boots from Saint Laurent to your footwear collection. Expertly crafted in Italy from polished leather, they feature almond toes, flared heels and convenient side zipper fastenings, ensuring timeless style.

Finish off your casual ensembles with the Tread Slick ankle boots from Alexander McQueen. Crafted from smooth leather, this pair features chunky rubber soles and is defined by silver-toned zipper fastening at the center.
Made from beige leather, the Zegna Triple Stitch sneakers sit atop rubber soles. Crafted in Italy, the style features embossed branding at the tounges and elasticated laces for a slip-on design.

Tom Ford creates sophisticated styles that will become a core part of your edit. Made of brown suede calfskin, these Chelsea boots have traditional elements, such as pull tabs, elasticated side panels, and stacked heels.

Perfect for daily strolls and outdoor activities, the Larue ankle boots from Moncler will be your go-to choice for both style and functionality. Made from supple leather, this pair features chunky soles and a slip-on style.
These loafers from Tod are a slip-on style for easy on-the-go wear. They’re made in Italy from beige-toned suede and sit atop comfortable rubber lug soles.

These wear-everywhere loafers from Giorgio Armani are made from black velvet with a pleated motif and finished with grosgrain piping. The style is set atop a leather sole with rubber inserts on the heel.

These sports-inspired sneakers from Tod's are casual and ergonomic. Built with panels of supple leather and lightweight technical fabric, they rest atop rubber outsoles accented with signature pebbles.

The latest addition to Gucci's line of retro sneakers is the MAC80. Made in Italy from leather, this pair has ribbed inserts and Interlocking G embroidery that references the house's founder Guccio Gucci.
Made from black suede and Orignal GG canvas, the Screener sneakers pay homage to classic sportswear. The style rest atop chunky rubber soles and are finished with red leather detailing.

Christian Louboutin’s Happyrui sneakers are a low-top design inspired by classic tennis shoes. The modern style combines leather and suede panels accented with polished spikes and sits atop thick rubber soles.
In a white colorway, these Dolce&Gabbana sneakers are Italian-made from leather, have a low-top silhouette, and feature the label's logo in black at the tongue and soles.

Brunello Cucinelli's designs are created in Solomeo, a medieval hamlet whose art and traditions are woven into the house's every fiber. These brown suede loafers are finished with tassels on the front and set atop a rubber sole.
These black M.A. Court high-top sneakers from Amiri are made with cotton canvas uppers with thick rubber soles and a rubberized logo on the side.

The Abubizz slippers are crafted from leather into a caged silhouette and feature silver-toned logo detailing. Finished with Christian Louboutin's iconic red soles, this pair makes every step you take a sophisticated one.
For everyday shoes that will elevate any look, embrace Tod’s Extralight desert boots. The design is crafted in Italy from suede and sits atop sturdy rubber soles.

At once iconic and understated, Valentino Garavani's VLogo carries the Maison's legacy of elegance. The motif appears in polished gold-tone metal on the grained calfskin construction of these slip-on loafers, complete with traditional pebble soles.

Lanvin’s Lite Curb sneakers are inspired by vintage skate styles. Made from tactile suede, the contemporary design comes with contrasting multicolored laces and is set atop rubber soles, featuring gold-toned logos on the sides.

The Cassandre thong sandals from Saint Laurent are made entirely from leather and are set upon flat soles. They secure with buckle-fastening ankle straps and feature the brand's unmistakable logo in gold hardware.
Made from leather, these Zegna sneakers sit atop rubber soles. Crafted in Italy, the style features embossed branding at the tounges and elasticated laces for a slip-on design.
The G Plage sandals from Givenchy will make a much-loved addition to your footwear edit. Boasting logo jacquard crossover straps, the style features leather trims and rests atop comfortable footbeds.

Tod's embodies the art of Italian craftsmanship with superior fabrications and timeless silhouettes that lend a sense of quiet sophistication. Made from soft suede, these desert boots rest on studded rubber soles with logo-embossed detailing.

Tod's embodies the art of Italian craftsmanship with superior fabrications and timeless silhouettes that lend a sense of quiet sophistication. This classic flair is showcased on designs such as these ergonomic low-top sneakers, made from leather and suede with technical fabric accents.

These Tech Runner trainers from Thom Browne have a lightweight mesh construction, suede trims and are finished with a tricolor stripe around the rubber soles, in addition to the label's signature grosgrain loop tab.
The Moody Island Dunk boots from Rick Owens are made in Italy from black leather. The everyday design has rubber soles and decorative laceless front panels and zipped sides.
Crafted in Italy, Gucci's classic low-top sneakers in white are accented by the house's embroidered bee and provide ultimate comfort, with a relaxed fit.
These Curb sneakers from Lanvin have an exaggerated silhouette, rest on rubber soles, and feature thick multicolored laces.
These boots from Rick Owens are made from leather to an ankle-length silhouette with elasticated side panels. They have a rounded toe, contrast rubber soles, and pull tabs.

Tod's embodies the art of Italian craftsmanship with superior fabrications and timeless silhouettes that lend a sense of quiet sophistication. These suede calfskin loafers have penny straps, apron toes, and Gommino pebbles on the heels.
Made from supple suede, these Zegna sneakers sit atop rubber soles. Crafted in Italy, the style features embossed branding at the tounges and elasticated laces for a slip-on design.
The Curb sneakers from Lanvin are crafted from leather and mesh in a chunky silhouette with perforated detailing on the uppers. They have padded tongues that showcase the house logo.
A warm-weather staple, Tom Ford's Barnes espadrilles are crafted in Spain and feature navy-hued suede uppers. They're set on classic cord soles and rubber outsoles for comfort and durability.

Fit to navigate any terrain, Alexander McQueen's Sprint sneakers sit on wide, chunky runner soles that run up the heels. The style is made from black and metallic leather with mesh panels and is accented with a Seal logo on the side.
The Monaco low-top sneakers from Moncler are made from smooth suede and rest atop rubber soles. At the sides, they feature M-shaped leather trims in the brand's classic colors.
Saint Laurent adds label-signature Western accents to the classic Wyatt ankle boots. Made from velvety suede, the pair rest atop block heels and boast rounded toes and stitched paneling.
Look to Saint Laurent for your summer shoe closet with these denim espadrilles. They're finished with tonal monogram embroidery at the heel counters.

A signature style of Rick Owens, these Geobasket lace-up leather sneakers feature a distinctive high-top silhouette. The pair has contrasting black-and-white contrast panels and are finished with comfortable rubber soles.
Add a textural flare to your sneaker edit with another unconventional and monochromatic design from Rick Owens. This pair has calf hair uppers and rubber soles.
A warm-weather staple, Tom Ford's Barnes espadrilles are crafted in Spain and feature black suede uppers. They're set on classic cord soles and rubber outsoles for comfort and durability.

Update your sneaker collection with the James style, spotlighting Tom Ford's sophisticated edge. Boasting a low-top silhouette with paneled suede and technical fabric that nods to retro styles, this design is offset by exaggerated midsoles and side-wrapping lugged soles.

Crafted from materials of the highest quality, Gianvito Rossi’s designs are handmade using both traditional craftsmanship and innovative techniques. Made of plush suede, the Chester chelsea boots have a classic Douglas silhouette with elasticated side panels.
Made from 100% leather uppers, atop chunky rubber soles, these white sneakers from Alexander McQueen feature a lace-up design, complete with a contrast rubber heel and black branding.
Alexander McQueen's low-top sneakers are crafted from leather with oversized rubber soles. An iconic style from the brand, this pair is finished with white laces and beige suede heel counters.
Made from leather, these Zegna sneakers sit atop rubber soles. Crafted in Italy, the style features embossed branding at the tounges and elasticated laces for a slip-on design.

Each Brunello Cucinelli design is handmade in Solomeo, a medieval hamlet whose art and traditions are woven into the house's every fiber. These leather loafers boast a polished quality that's achieved by hand buffing.
Slick and comfortable, these clogs from Dolce&Gabbana are crafted from black leather with a rubber sole. The style is finished with a silver-tone logo plaque and a buckled ankle strap.

Tod's Tab sneakers epitomize relaxed luxury. Crafted with attention to detail, these sneakers combine the comfort of suede with a sleek design. The iconic Tod's tab adds a touch of sophistication, making them a versatile choice.
A true classic, the 1953 Horsebit leather loafers from Gucci feature the label's iconic icon detailed over the bridges and are crafted in Italy.

A combination of the loafer and the espadrille, these slip-on shoes from Christian Louboutin are Italian-crafted from suede, come in black, and accented by an alligator-effect embossed leather at the heel.
Balenciaga brings a fresh update to the 3XL design with these sneaker mules. The mesh and faux leather paneling have a worn-in effect, while chunky soles give this pair contemporary flair.

Saint Laurent's Tristan loafers have a glossy patent leather upper complemented by an embellished arch strap. Made in Italy, the shoes have a square-shaped toe and will add a touch of sophistication to any ensemble.

Since its conception in 1961, Saint Laurent has been coveted for its elegant Parisian aesthetic. Rendered from glossy calfskin, the XIV ankle boots have a seamless silhouette with block heels and tapered square toes.

The Trailgrip Lite2 sneakers perfectly exemplify Moncler's ability to blend comfort and style. They have black sock-like uppers made of technical fabric and reinforced with logo-printed green side panels, chunky soles, and rubber toecaps.

A signature style of Rick Owens, these Geobasket leather sneakers feature a distinctive high-top silhouette with elongated tongues. This padded style rests on flexible rubber soles and secures with iconic wrap-around laces.

The Trailgrip Lite2 sneakers perfectly exemplify Moncler's ability to blend comfort and style. They have black sock-like uppers made of technical fabric and reinforced with logo-printed side panels, chunky soles, and rubber toecaps.

These SL/61 sneakers from Saint Laurent have a classic low-top silhouette. Made from leather, they have perforations to ensure breathability, lace-up fronts, and contrasting panels for a basketball-inspired finish.
Elegant and versatile, these ankle boots from Giorgio Armani are a modern wardrobe staple. Made from black leather, the style has a rounded toe, an elasticated gusset and sits atop a rubber sole.
Complete your look on a sharp note with these Derby shoes from Dolce&Gabbana. The timeless style is made from patent brushed leather with grosgrain trims.

The Louis Junior sneakers are inspired by basketball, presenting Christian Louboutin's elegant take on athletic styling. Rendered from tactile suede, this low-top style boasts streamlined panels and iconic red soles.

The Dhabubizz sandals spotlighted a minimalistic approach to Christian Louboutin's glamorous essence. Made of smooth calfskin, this style has H-shaped uppers with metallic CL monograms and padded interiors.

Slip into the easygoing elegance of these suede mules, detailed with polished CL monograms to the caged uppers. This pair is finished with the brand's iconic red lacquered soles for unparalleled sophistication.

Christian Louboutin's Louis sneakers are inspired by a "walk through a classical French garden," appearing with timeless elements. This suede style is detailed with tonal spikes, offset by logo discs to the high-top shafts.

These driving shoes from Tods will make a timeless addition to your footwear edit. Made from suede, the style have a slip-on design detailed with the label's signature rubber pebbles on the heel and soles.

Established with the aim to create the world’s finest fabrics, Zegna is now the go-to brand for luxurious and innovative menswear. The calfskin X-Lite loafers have penny straps, round toes, and whipstitch trims.

product_name: Owen Runner mesh and leather sneakers
description: Step into The Row’s effortless minimalism with the Owen Runner sneakers. This style is made in Italy from technical mesh and features leather panels, contrasting laces, and sporty lugged soles.
Look to Loro Piana for warm-weather wardrobe staples that will give your edit a sophisticated edge like the Sea-Sail Walk loafers. Made in Italy from leather, the design sits atop a rubber midsole.

At once iconic and understated, Valentino Garavani's VLogo carries the Maison's legacy of elegance. Embellishing the vamps of the Leisure Flows suede espadrilles, this style has jute-woven midsoles with Rockstud details.
Alexander McQueen's low-top sneakers are crafted from suede with oversized rubber soles. An iconic style from the brand, this pair is finished with tonal laces and comes in a refreshing green hue.

Exemplifying a minimalist aesthetic, Dolce&Gabbana's Saint Tropez leather sneakers radiate refined elegance. With their lace-up fronts and iconic logo plaque, these low-top sneakers are elevated to an exceptional level of sophistication.
Crafted from pebble grain leather with a double English welt-stitched leather sole, these black brogues from Thom Browne are finished with a signature grosgrain loop tab.
Perforated with Gucci's double G motif, these slip-on mules are made from rubber in black.
Alexander McQueen's low-top sneakers are crafted from leather with oversized rubber soles. An iconic style from the brand, this pair is finished with tonal laces and comes in a beige hue.
Elevate your warm-weather ensembles with these espadrilles from Gucci. Made from raffia and trimmed with leather, this pair boasts the Interlocking G motif on the uppers.
The Mojave sandals from Saint Laurent are a modern design with a streamlined silhouette. Crafted from smooth leather with wide crossover uppers, they have round toes and adjustable buckle fastening.

These Gucci sneakers are crafted in Italy from black leather, featuring the House web in navy and red with a gold embroidered bee on the uppers, and are accented by textured leather details on the heel counters.

Calling to mind the chunky styles of an earlier era, the MA-1 sneakers from Amiri have wide laces and oversized tongues. They’re made from panels of leather with mesh inserts and perforated uppers to ensure airflow.

Givenchy’s mirrored 4G logo is an ode to founder Hubert de Givenchy’s love of symmetry. These low-top G4 sneakers are made from patent leather and sit atop chunky logo-embossed rubber soles for an elevated look.

Tricolor grosgrain trims add a preppy touch to Thom Browne’s Americana-led designs. The motif decorates the pull tabs of the Tech Runner sneakers, complete with suede-trimmed uppers and athletic-inspired transparent cushioned soles.

In a dark brown shade, these Brunello Cucinelli Derby shoes are made in Italy from particularly supple suede and have rubber soles for protection and grip. The lace-up style has tonal topstitching and almond-shaped toes.

Jil Sander's sophisticated minimalism is characterized by neutral tones, clean lines, and precisely-placed details. These sneakers are made from canvas to a high-top silhouette and set atop rubber soles.

Zegna joins forces with Norda to create premium athleisure wear such as these running sneakers.  Made from recycled materials, the pair is designed to ensure high performance, featuring Vibram soles for extra grip and optimal comfort.
The Varsiboat boat shoes from Christian Louboutin are made from suede for a tactile handle. Set on flat rubber soles, they have debossed detailing at the vamps and rounded toes.
Run in style with the Kenzo-Dome sneakers from Kenzo. Made from suede, the low-top style has round toes and two-tone soles for a chic twist.
The Cambridge sneakers from Tom Ford are made from suede uppers featuring scalloped leather trims at the side, atop rubber soles with a logo at the heel counter.
These loafers from Christian Louboutin are made from suede for a tactile handle. Set on flat soles, they have penny straps and rounded toes.
The Radcliffe sneakers from Tom Ford are a classic pair for every day. Crafted from suede and leather, this style is finished with breathable perforations on the uppers.
These sneakers from Gucci are crafted from Original GG canvas to a high-top silhouette with grosgrain trims. They're set atop chunky rubber soles with Interlocking G grips.

product_name: x Wales Bonner SL72 suede and knit sneakers
description: Part of the Adidas x Wales Bonner line, the SL72 sneakers are designed with knitted uppers and smooth suede trims. They're set on ridged rubber soles and finished with the iconic 3 Stripe motif.

Now a house signature, the Burberry Check pattern was originally used as trench coat lining in the 1920s. The pattern animates these felted penny loafers, adding a heritage flair to a classic shoe style.
These black leather loafers from Tom Ford are an elegant staple, featuring twisted straps on the uppers and rest on smooth leather soles.
Featuring a stitched Saint Laurent logo on the side, these low-top distressed canvas and leather sneakers in cream offer a relaxed fit.

Tom Ford’s tailoring showcases a meticulous attention to detail with a dose of high-octane glamour. Boasting traditional formal elements, these calfskin suede loafers have apron toes, vamp straps, and flexible rubber soles.

product_name: x Wales Bonner SL72 suede and knit sneakers
description: Part of the Adidas x Wales Bonner line, the SL72 sneakers are designed with knitted uppers and smooth suede trims. They're set on ridged rubber soles and finished with the iconic 3 Stripe motif.

Gucci's loafers feature an instantly recognizable house motif, the Interlocking G – a historic interpretation of founder Guccio Gucci's initials. These slip-on shoes are made in Italy from leather with tonal stitching.

Balance style and practicality with these boots from Brunello Cucinelli. The design is crafted in Italy from grained brown leather and features a secure lace-up silhouette set atop flexible rubber soles.

Crafted from materials of the highest quality, Gianvito Rossi’s designs are handmade using both traditional craftsmanship and innovative techniques. Made of polished calfskin, the Chester boots have a classic Chelsea silhouette with elasticated side panels.

Lanvin’s Lite Curb sneakers are inspired by vintage skate styles. Made from tactile suede, the contemporary design comes with contrasting multicolored laces and is set atop rubber soles, featuring gold-toned logos on the sides.
Crafted in Italy from suede, these ankle boots balance sophistication and practicality. They have lug soles that provide plenty of grip on rougher terrain.

Pledge your brand allegiance to Gucci with these logo sandals. Made in Italy from leather, this style has a GG matelassé leather insole, a silver-tone metal buckle closure, and a Gucci logo on each upper.

Made in Italy from polished smooth leather in black, these Derby shoes from Givenchy arrive in a versatile silhouette. They boast a round-toe shape, rest on thick rubber soles, and are finished with tonal laces.

Tom Ford’s Claydon monk strap shoes embody the label’s high-octane glamour and modern tailoring. Crafted from smooth leather, the elegant pair features a classic cap top stitch design, finished with brass hardware.
These black leather Saint Laurent espadrilles feature the label's YSL monogram embossed on the uppers, and sport a grosgrain pull-on tab and jute rope midsole.

Tod's embodies the art of Italian craftsmanship with superior fabrications and timeless silhouettes that lend a sense of quiet sophistication. This classic flair is showcased on designs such as these Derby shoes, made from dark brown suede for versatile styling options.

Made from soft suede, these desert boots will take you from office to the weekend seamlessly. The versatile design rests on studded rubber soles with logo-embossed detailing.
These sneakers from Brunello Cucinelli are a refined take on basketball shoes. Crafted in Italy from suede, this pair has perforated uppers for breathability and the Solomeo crest logo on the heels.

The VLogo Pace sneakers from Valentino Garavani make for a vibrant addition to your footwear edit. Crafted from mesh with leather trims, the sporty design features the brand-signature VLogo detail and is set atop dented rubber soles.

Balenciaga's Runner sneakers are inspired by sporty footwear from the '90s. They're made from mesh with multicolored nylon paneling, and set on rubber soles that have been adapted from the brand's iconic Track design.

Balenciaga's Runner sneakers sport the label's signature overlay design with mesh and nylon uppers. In grey, blue and black, they have a worn-in look and logo embroideries throughout.

Elevate your casual footwear edit with Maison Margiela's New Evolution high-top sneakers. Made from leather and canvas panels, the style has a cleated sole, double laces, and a numeric logo on the tone.

This classic flair is showcased on designs such as these lace-up sneakers, made from smooth suede with a slight vintage effect. The versatile style is finished with logo embossments on the tongues and sides.

The Rockrunner sneakers from Valentino Garavani are made with fabric uppers that feature suede trims. This style is made in a classic round-toe silhouette with a lace-up design and set atop rubber soles.

These loafers from Versace offer a contemporary twist to an otherwise classic style. Crafted from smooth leather, the elegant design is set atop chunky rubber soles and features a gold-toned Medusa motif.
These sophisticated loafers will add Italian flair to your footwear collection. Crafted from smooth leather, this classic style has Interlocking G chain links over the vamps and low heels.

The Lug sandals perfectly encapsulate Bottega Veneta's love for refreshing traditional house codes. Finished with buckled slingback straps, they’re made in Italy from leather in the brand's Intreccio weave.

Update your footwear collection with versatile designs, like the Radcliffe sneakers from Tom Ford. Crafted from smooth leather, this low-top pair features perforated uppers and T-logo motifs at the sides.

Add the Moorea sandals from Loro Piana to your warm-weather footwear rotation. Made from smooth leather, this pair features wide straps on the uppers and is finished with silver-toned buckle fastening.
These black canvas Saint Laurent espadrilles are accented with the label's logo embroidered at the sides in black, and sport a leather heel-tab with the label's inscription in gold tone.

Elevate your looks with ease by slipping into these Gucci loafers. Crafted in Italy from polished grained leather, these are a timeless investment with half horsebit detailing and rest atop comfortable pebbled soles.
In a sleek white silhouette crafted from smooth leather, these sneakers from Christian Louboutin feature small spikes on the toe box.

The Hybrid slides from Alexander McQueen are defined by dual buckled straps and the brand's signature oversized rubber soles. The design promises comfort and style with molded footbeds and logo detailing.
The Loubi Flip thong sandals from Christian Louboutin are an edgy take on a poolside classic. Featuring spiked studs on the toe straps, they have comfortable rubber footbeds and signature red soles.
The Gommino Derby shoes from Tod's are an all-year-round footwear staple. Made from suede, the lace-up pair features thick soles and signature pebble detailing at the heels.

product_name: Penny No Back suede and croc-effect loafers
description: The Penny No Back loafers from Christian Louboutin are made from goose-hued suede for a tactile handle. The pair features penny straps and a croc-effect embossed section at the back that can be folded down.
Turn to these sneakers from Balenciaga for a design that you'll wear again and again. The versatile style is crafted from nylon panels and is set atop a chunky rubber sole.
Finished with Christian Louboutin's iconic red soles, this pair makes every step you take a sophisticated one. The Alpinono Chelsea boots are a timeless style made purely from leather.
Crafted from lustrous suede, these black espadrilles from Christian Louboutin are finished with the label's crest logo on the uppers.
In a sleek black silhouette crafted from smooth leather, these sneakers from Christian Louboutin feature small spikes on the toe box.

Take a step in the right direction with these ankle boots from Tom Ford. Expertly crafted in Italy from velvety-soft suede, they feature stacked heels, elasticated side guests, and pull tabs for easy on-off wear.

A subversive riff on traditional Japanese socks, Maison Margiela's Tabi shoes left their first traces on the brand's runway in 1989. This polished leather style features grooved rubber soles and penny strap vamps.

Designed in New York, Common Projects' minimalist footwear is handcrafted by expert shoemakers in the Marche region of Italy. Crafted from leather these classic loafers feature penny straps and signature coding on the outer sides.

Run in style with the GEL-LYTE III OG sneakers from Asics. The pair reimagines the classic construction with suede overlays and gradient midsoles. The GEL technology in the soles will give you the ultimate comfort.

Sicilian culture is at the heart of Dolce&Gabbana's aesthetic, which attributes most of its bold styles to its Italian heritage. Made of patent calfskin, these lace-up brogues have traditional perforated trims and exaggerated welts.

Known for refreshing updates on classic styles, Asics presents the Gel-NYC sneakers. This sporty pair appears here in a mesh construction, with tactical suede inserts. Ideal for everyday wear, the lace-up design rests on ergonomic rubber soles.
The Campus 80s low-top sneakers are one of Adidas' most iconic styles. The retro-inspired design is made from suede and is accented with the brand’s ever-recognizable 3-Stripes.

The Achilles Fade sneakers from Common Projects come in a minimalist round-toe silhouette. Crafted from glossy patent leather, the classic style rests on rubber soles and is finished with signature coding on the outer sides.

Asics’s EX89 sneakers take inspiration from the archival Gel-Extreme basketball shoes with a modern twist.  Crafted from layered leather, this colorful design features a next-level cushioning system and a sculpted heel for all-day comfort.

Asics' technical expertise ensures that every step is a comfortable, perfectly-engineered one. Reimagining the Gel-Extreme '80s style, the white and beige EX89 sneakers have a paneled calfskin construction with perforated toe boxes and articulated soles.

Y-3 revisions sportswear silhouettes with a streetwear-inspired approach, spotlighted by the Ultraboost Light sneakers. Made of adidas PRIMEKNIT textile mesh, this running style has three-stripe sidewalls, advanced Lightstrike cushioning, and ENERGYRODS to reduce energy loss.

A longstanding collaboration between Yohji Yamamoto and Adidas, Y-3 is an amalgamation of the Japanese designer's avant-garde aesthetic and sportswear classics. Made with suede uppers and logo-embossed leather heels, the Gazelle sneakers feature Sashiko-inspired tonal stitching.

The longstanding collaboration between Adidas and Yohji Yamamoto results in these iconic Y-3 Gazelle sneakers. Featuring suede uppers and leather heels, the design features Sashiko-inspired tonal stitching.
With a distinctive gold-tone curb chain on the uppers, these JW Anderson mules are made from black leather with cork midsoles for a comfortable and lightweight step.

The Andreas Straps are the original Italian Alp hybrid boots, made for the mountains and the city. The style features a Vibram® sole for optimal traction and has ripstop uppers for lightweight weather protection.

At once iconic and understated, Valentino Garavani's VLogo carries the Maison's legacy of elegance. Embellishing the vamps of these suede espadrilles, this style has jute-woven midsoles with Rockstud details.

Brunello Cucinelli showcases fine Italian craftsmanship with this pair of ankle boots, cut from smooth suede. The lace-up design is carefully stitched into sturdy wood-effect midsoles and durable rubber outsoles.
One of Gucci's most powerful emblems, the Horsebit points to the house's storied fascination with equestrian design codes. These loafers are made from crochet leather in a round-toe silhouette.
Made in Italy, the Jordaan loafers from Gucci are a classic style with elegant almond toes and a slightly lifted heel. They're made from suede with golden Horsebit hardware across the vamps.
The Boccaccio espadrilles define Dolce&Gabbana's take on off-duty elegance. Made in Italy, the cotton canvas uppers are embellished with a logo plaque and classic jute trims.

Sicilian culture is at the heart of Dolce&Gabbana's aesthetic, which attributes most of its bold styles to its Italian heritage. Elevate your edit with these slides crafted from leather and embossed with the brand's logo.

The Hybrid slides from Alexander McQueen are defined by dual buckled straps and the brand's signature oversized rubber soles. The design promises comfort and style with molded footbeds and logo detailing.
Gucci's trademarked Horsebit hardware was initially inspired by Guccio Gucci's observation of English equestrian teams. These polished leather slippers have rounded toes and ergonomic footbeds.

Loro Piana’s updated slide sandals will be your go-to warm-weather footwear choice. Expertly crafted in Italy from lightweight plonge leather, the pair boasts braided straps and rests atop artisanally stitched soles.

Aptly named for their road-ready look, the Tourist sandals from Balenciaga are a comfortable choice for long walks on warm days. The faux leather design features three hook and loop upper straps with Velcro fastening, and embossed logo detailing on the heels.
These low-top sneakers from Acne Studios are inspired by classic '80s basketball styles. The design has blue suede inserts, eye-catching transparent Face charms, and cursive logo detailing.
